title: Bug 14943 - Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: The Code Assist feature in the software does not follow the expected behavior for platform line endings.
OB: When using the Code Assist feature with files that contain different line endings, such as CR/LF, the software does not handle them correctly.
EB: The Code Assist feature should properly handle files with different line endings, respecting the platform line ends.
SR: The software should be modified to correctly interpret and respect the line endings when providing code suggestions through the Code Assist feature.
